const Table = ({ rows, transactions }) => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const filteredRows = rows.filter(row => row.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())); const filteredTransactions = transactions.filter(transaction => transaction.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return (
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{filteredRows.map((row, index) => ( ))}
Date Description Category Amount
{row.date} {row.description} {row.category} {row.amount}
{filteredTransactions.map((transaction, index) => ( ))}
Date Description Category Amount
{transaction.date} {transaction.description} {transaction.category} {transaction.amount}
); }; export default Table;
